name: Gallery of Creative Intelligence and Innovation
name_original: Gallery of Creative Intelligence and Innovation
description:
Welcome to the Gallery of Creative Intelligence and Innovation.

Use the WASD keys to move

Use the MOUSE to look around

CLICK on an artwork to read the artist's statement

Special thanks to Benn Hamilton, Miranda Crossley,  Lucy Ward,  Victoria Fernandez, Alex Wegman, Rashmi Mohotti, Gabriella Taylor-Helme and Adam Campbell.

Your efforts were greatly appreciated!
